content.query:
-- type your sql script here, we now have intellisense

SELECT CAST( 123456 AS BINARY(4) ), CAST( 123456 AS VARBINARY(4) )

-- type your sql script here, we now have intellisense

SELECT CAST( 123456 AS VARBINARY(4) ), CAST( 123456 AS BINARY(4) )


CREATE TABLE TABLEB(
	M varbinary(max)
)
WITH
(
    DISTRIBUTION = REPLICATE,
    HEAP
)

INSERT INTO TABLEB VALUES(0x0001E240)


SELECT * FROM TABLEB
